title: Population Size of Sea Lions Over Time

content.description: Figure 1. Change in the population size of sea lions over time. Error bars represent <math alttext="plus or minus 2 S E sub X bar" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>±</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mtext>SE</mtext></mrow><mrow><mover><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>¯</mo></mrow></mover></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: Which of the following best estimates the population size of the sea lions in 2000 based on the data shown in Figure 1?
